snippet: Harvin missed nearly all of the regular season with a hip problem, and much of the playoffs after a concussion, but was effective in the Super Bowl as a runner, receiver and returner.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks wide receiver Percy Harvin justifies team's investment and high expectations during Super Bowl, returning second-half kickoff for touchdown and turning in 137 total yards; Harvin had missed nearly all the regular season and much of the playoffs due to injury.
lead_paragraph: Harvin missed nearly all of the regular season with a hip problem, and much of the playoffs after a concussion, but was effective in the Super Bowl as a runner, receiver and returner.

headline.main: Percy Harvin Finally Delivers on Seattle’s Investment
headline.print_headline: Harvin Finally Delivers on Seattle’s Investment
